LanguageData.OE_LightsStrip.label: obsidia LED lights strip
LanguageData.OE_LightsStrip.description: A glowing strip of lights, essential for Obsidia's signature design and illumination.
LanguageData.OE_HiddenLightsStrip.label: hidden obsidia LED lights strip
LanguageData.OE_HiddenLightsStrip.description: A glowing hidden strip of lights, essential for Obsidia's signature design and illumination. They're tougher than regular strip, but also slower to build and more expensive.
LanguageData.OE_Lighting_CeilingLamp_Small.label: small obsidia ceiling lamp
LanguageData.OE_Lighting_CeilingLamp_Small.descriptio: This is a ceiling 1x1 lamp providing light, while not using any floor space. Expensive, but well-protected.
LanguageData.OE_Lighting_CeilingLamp_Big.label: big obsidia ceiling lamp
LanguageData.OE_Lighting_CeilingLamp_Big.description: This is a ceiling 2x2 lamp providing light, while not using any floor space. Expensive, but well-protected.
